mapper.select: SELECT * FROM player

INSERT INTO player(player_id, team_id,player_name,player_number,player_birth,player_height,player_weight,player_wingspan,player_position,player_servicing,player_logo) VALUES(#{playerId},#{teamId},#{playerName},#{playerNumber},#{playerBirth},#{playerHeight},#{playerWeight}, #{playerWingspan},#{playerPosition},#{playerServicing},#{logo})
SELECT * from player where player_id = #{playerId}
SELECT * from player where player_id = #{playerId}
SELECT * from team
select player_id playerId,player_name name,player_number number from player,team where player_name = #{name} and team.team_id = #{teamId} and player.team_id = team.team_id;

select player_id playerId,player_name playerName,team.team_id teamId,team_name teamName,player_number number, player_height height,player_weight weight,player_wingspan wingspan,player_birth birth, player_position position from team,player where player_id = #{playerId} and player.team_id = team.team_id;

select FORMAT(avg(score),1) '得分', FORMAT(avg(bound),1) '篮板',FORMAT(avg(assist),1) '助攻', FORMAT(avg(block),1)'盖帽',FORMAT(avg(steal),1)'抢断',FORMAT(avg(turnover),1) '失误', FORMAT(avg(free),1)'罚球',FORMAT(avg(foul),1)'犯规' from match_data,match_ where match_season=#{season} AND match_.match_id = match_data.match_id AND player_id =#{playerId};

select FORMAT(avg(score),1) score, FORMAT(avg(bound),1) bound,FORMAT(avg(assist),1) assist, FORMAT(avg(block),1) block,FORMAT(avg(steal),1) steal,FORMAT(avg(turnover),1) turnover, FORMAT(avg(free),1) free,FORMAT(avg(foul),1) foul from match_data,match_ where match_season=#{season} AND match_.match_id = match_data.match_id AND player_id =#{playerId};

select FORMAT(avg(score),1) score, FORMAT(avg(bound),1) bound,FORMAT(avg(assist),1) assist, FORMAT(avg(block),1)block,FORMAT(avg(steal),1)steal,FORMAT(avg(turnover),1) turnover, FORMAT(avg(free),1) free,FORMAT(avg(foul),1)foul from match_data,match_ where match_.match_id=match_data.match_id AND match_season=#{season};

select max(score) score ,max(assist) assist,max(bound) bound,max(block) block,max(steal) steal,max(foul) foul, max(turnover)turnover from match_,match_data where match_.match_id = match_data.match_id AND match_season = #{season}

select date_format(match_date,'%y-%m-%d %H:%i') date,team_name teamName,match_time time,score,assist,bound,steal,block,turnover,free,foul from match_data,match_,team where match_.match_id=match_data.match_id AND ((match_away=team.team_id and is_home=1) or (match_home=team.team_id and is_home=0)) AND player_id=#{playerId} AND match_season=#{season};
